Tips and TricksÂ¶

Here are some tips and tricks for working with the XBRL Taxonomy Validator:

  • Customization: You can customize the behavior of the validator by modifying certain parameters or extending its functionality through inheritance.

  • Logging: Utilize logging to track the validation and fixing process. This can help in debugging and understanding the workflow better.

  • Optimization: Explore optimization techniques such as parallel processing or caching to improve the performance of the validator, especially for large taxonomy packages.
